title: :: Low - efficiency flu footage "prove " that you should never get it?
subtitle: The tricky sites are trying to use a season in which the influenza vaccine is less effective than usual as evidence that its vaccination is worthless.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Death from the flu for eight people who were vaccinated over 65 years in Santa Barbara County, California, during the 2017-2018 flu season proves that they should not get the flu shot.
